Module vpm.gui_prototype
Package vpm.gui_prototype.models.DatabaseStuff.PetData

Class PetManager

java.lang.Object
vpm.gui_prototype.models.DatabaseStuff.PetData.PetManager
public class PetManager extends Object
Manages pet-related operations, including adding, updating, deleting, and searching for pets in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PetManager(IPetDAO petDAO)
    Constructs a PetManager with the specified Pet Data Access Object.

  • Constructor Details

    • PetManager

      public PetManager(IPetDAO petDAO)
      Constructs a PetManager with the specified Pet Data Access Object.
      Parameters:
      petDAO - The data access object for managing pet data. Must not be null.

  • Method Details

    • searchPets

      public List<Pet> searchPets(String query)
      Searches for pets that match the given query across their attributes.
      Parameters:
      query - The search query to match against pet attributes. If null or empty, returns all pets.
      Returns:
      A list of pets that match the search criteria.

    • addPet

      public void addPet(Pet pet, int userId)
      Adds a new pet to the database.
      Parameters:
      pet - The pet to add. Must not be null.
      userId - The ID of the user adding the pet. Must be a valid user ID.

    • deletePet

      public void deletePet(Pet pet, int userId)
      Deletes a pet from the database.
      Parameters:
      pet - The pet to delete. Must not be null.
      userId - The ID of the user who owns the pet. Must be a valid user ID.

    • updatePet

      public void updatePet(Pet pet, int userId)
      Updates an existing pet in the database.
      Parameters:
      pet - The pet with updated details. Must not be null.
      userId - The ID of the user who owns the pet. Must be a valid user ID.

    • getAllUsersPets

      public List<Pet> getAllUsersPets(int userId)
      Retrieves all pets owned by a specific user from the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose pets are to be retrieved. Must be a valid user ID.
      Returns:
      A list of pets owned by the specified user. If the user has no pets, returns an empty list.

    • getAllPets

      public List<Pet> getAllPets()
      Retrieves all pets from the database, regardless of ownership.
      Returns:
      A list of all pets in the database. If there are no pets, returns an empty list.
